description: When testing the scheduler with `./run_tests.sh nova.tests.test_scheduler` there is a problem setting flags resulting in the exception: "AttributeError: stub_network" during the setUp function.
title: test_scheduler doesn't run in isolation

comments.content: When testing the scheduler with `./run_tests.sh nova.tests.test_scheduler` there is a problem setting flags resulting in the exception: "AttributeError: stub_network" during the setUp function.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xtoddx

comments.content:
=== modified file 'nova/tests/test_scheduler.py'
--- nova/tests/test_scheduler.py        2010-12-23 18:31:46 +0000
+++ nova/tests/test_scheduler.py        2010-12-28 23:56:05 +0000
@@ -33,6 +33,7 @@
 
 FLAGS = flags.FLAGS
 flags.DECLARE('max_cores', 'nova.scheduler.simple')
+flags.DECLARE('stub_network', 'nova.compute.manager')
 
 
 class TestDriver(driver.Scheduler):
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: The above patch will fix the error.  I refrained from branching and submitting because it looks like Todd has assigned it to himself.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
